mapper.select: select distinct sender_no, receiver_no, max(send_date) as sendDate, name from message left outer join member on(message.no=member.no) where sender_no in(select distinct sender_no from message where sender_no=#{senderNo} or receiver_no=#{senderNo}) group by sender_no, receiver_no,name

select sender_no, receiver_no, content, send_date, receive_date from message where (sender_no=#{senderNo} and receiver_no=#{receiverNo}) or (sender_no=#{receiverNo} and receiver_no=#{senderNo}) order by send_date
